description: The schema for a video record in pytube/data
title: Video

___language.description: ISO 639-3 language code of spoken language used in video

___videos.description: Array of video locations and types

___type.description: File type of video at associated location

___length.description: [Deprecated] Size of video (in bytes). Please use 'size' instead.

___copyright_text.description: Copyright license for video or link to copyright information.

___recorded.description: ISO 8601 Date on which video was recorded (YYYY-MM-DD)

___description.description: reStructuredText or plain text description of video

___alias.description: [Deprecated] Legacy path to video on pyvideo.org

___slug.description: Web-safe slug for video. Must be unique amongst other videos in same category

___category.description: [Deprecated] Category of video. This is duplicated by category files and is thus depriciated in video files.

items.description: URL of resource related to video.

___summary.description: reStructuredText or plain text description of video

___speakers.description: Ordered array of speakers in video.

___id.description: ID for video. Must be unique amongst all videos if present.
